Reviews.Title: “Depends on your expectations”
Reviews.Author: Matthew1234
Reviews.Content: read reviews worried staying id whirl booking elsewhere fell minute paid £26 single regular budget hotel guest london cheap expectations low pleasantly surprised staff friendly wasnt ivy house cedar lodge doors card locks interior exterior doors cctv pretty secure decor basic somewhat tired cant criticise cleanliness bed linen bathroom particularly happy upgraded double ensuite extra cost traveling london expect getting value money major cities readjust expectations paying pretty lowest price london consequently shouldnt expect spacious charming hotel perspective bed yha dormitory london £20 expect functional clean yes bathrooms seriously tiny yes walls paperthin yes carpets looking little threadbare watch spot tv hit hay dont money conclusion ill staying wife romantic weekend break ill booking cheap stay im town own didnt bother breakfast cant comment

Reviews.Content: terrible road annex hotel call hotel 6 flights narrow stairs door landing door looked door loft double bed 2 hell beds window barred prison cell nicotine stained curtain hanging walls black damp smelt straight stairs road ivy house demanded money ushered whilst tried luggage saying safe mei onto 30 mins repeating listing endless problemsthe main 2 fire regs hell beyond wasnt hotel booked refunded £85 hotel stay save pay extra £20 stay else

Reviews.Title: “Ivy house hotel”
Reviews.Author: KittyKat06
Reviews.Content: friend recently trip london chose ivy house hotel stay cheap looked decent hotel website discusted call tiny boxed size bunkbed single bed sheets looked filthy carpet discusting soon entered discusting smell bathroom call smelt worse decided couldnt stay complaint finally money stayed days inn hotel road dont stay hotel discusting definately worst hotel
